channel.title: The Rune World - My First Ever Project/Server - First time coder!
channel.description:
[center][b]The Rune World - Completely New Project - First ever server/project made by Runeter - First time coder![/b][/center] [center][i]Hello, this is my first ever project that i ever made, its a 317 server which will have many features and new things that you haven't seen on any other servers![/i][/center]
[center]Green = Ready to set public Yellow = Almost ready to add in server Red = Worked on[/center]
[ul][li]Completely new working home! - 50%[/li] [li]New monster, training and player killing spots! - 2%[/li] [li]New teleports to new places never seen on normal servers! - 0%[/li] [li]Custom items are in-game and no longer can be buyed in shops! - 80%[/li] [li]Bosses and some other monsters will be aggresive! - 10%[/li] [li]Some certain monsters will have they correct real runescape spots - 30%[/li] [li]Monsters will have their correct drops, along with some customs - 30%[/li][/ul]
More features will get listed! So trust me, this isn't the only thing i will add! This is just what i will add at the start.
[b]How home looks so far![/b] (This is how you will look out when you start, don't worry, you can change your look) [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2rz8036.png[/img]
[b]The Custom Items[/b] (You may post suggestion on what customs, but these is the ones i've added so far) [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/11lnbc1.png[/img]
[b]Need help with new dagganoth spot! Please post co-ordinates for the dagganoth spot below that ladder![/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2aalis4.png[/img]
[b]Suggestions so far![/b]
[b]Wanted models![/b] (With working animation)
[ul][li]Vesta, Statius, Moriggan and Zurial armour![/li][/ul]
[b]Credits[/b]
[ul][li]SilentCJ - Most models[/li] [li]Rich` - RichScape Client[/li] [li]Delta_ - Deltascape Source[/li][/ul]
Please post suggestion, what models you want, what features you want! Absolute anything that you think can improve my server!

Good luck, needs a bit more work but good luck.

item.title: The Rune World - My First Ever Project/Server - First time coder!
item.dc:creator: @Runeter Runeter
item.description:
@Runeter wrote:

satesql:

Why do you type omfg like you’re surprised the npcs are all attacking ya?

Thats not important, just wanted to type that like, wouldn’t you say something like that if you didn’t know they were following you… Anyway, i need help with deleting and adding objects in delta. I also want to delete objects like walls, buildings and such.

Read full topic

item.title: The Rune World - My First Ever Project/Server - First time coder!
item.dc:creator: @Runeter Runeter
item.description:
@Runeter wrote:

New pictures! Enjoy!

Same home! Picture shows working Chivarly and Piety!

2v1ntvs.png765×503

Full daggonath! Only way to win is having a 5 player-team!

2nvq8au.png765×503

Working 2-handed Dragon Claws! Still working on 4 hits! (So far you can hit 8 max, you can use spec 4 times and in real runescape 1 special is 50 and hits 4 times)

2czdoo3.png765×503

And i got a problem that i know how to fix, but i won’t do it now, so I’ll do it later. The problem is if you die at Daggs or leave, they follow you, like in the pic below.

4ta4iq.png765×503

Read full topic

item.source: The Rune World - My First Ever Project/Server - First time coder!

item.title: The Rune World - My First Ever Project/Server - First time coder!
item.dc:creator: @Runeter Runeter
item.description:
@Runeter wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:6, topic:268346”][quote author=Runeter link=topic=354159.msg2713574#msg2713574 date=1237492258]

I’m trying to make a new and improved delta source, along with editing home and stuff.

New and improved would mean cleaning out the useless stuff, and adding your own methods, processes, etc.

Yes i know, i will start by cleaning out quests and requirments for most stuff. Then move to the most advanced process and such, but on the start, i think i will start by editing the source only.
[/quote]
You should clean out the client class first, in my opinion. Some of the methods are pretty crappy.[/quote]

Hm… I do it later, but right now i got to go… Send me a explained PM about cleaning client.class/java and any other files please. I’m new to coding here, but i take on advanced steps. Only send me PM if you know how to do it. I just need explaining about what needs to be cleaned, and how to remove it without damaging my server. Thanks… Now i have to leave comptuer.

Read full topic
item.source: The Rune World - My First Ever Project/Server - First time coder!

item.title: The Rune World - My First Ever Project/Server - First time coder!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Runeter, post:5, topic:268346”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=354159.msg2713569#msg2713569 date=1237492029]

I’m trying to make a new and improved delta source, along with editing home and stuff.

New and improved would mean cleaning out the useless stuff, and adding your own methods, processes, etc.
[/quote]

Yes i know, i will start by cleaning out quests and requirments for most stuff. Then move to the most advanced process and such, but on the start, i think i will start by editing the source only. ;)[/quote]
You should clean out the client class first, in my opinion. Some of the methods are pretty crappy.

Read full topic

I’m trying to make a new and improved delta source, along with editing home and stuff.
[/quote]
New and improved would mean cleaning out the useless stuff, and adding your own methods, processes, etc. ;)[/quote]

Yes i know, i will start by cleaning out quests and requirments for most stuff. Then move to the most advanced process and such, but on the start, i think i will start by editing the source only.
